entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
